headline: My brain of fire
description: A vivid, chaotic self-portrait rendered in colored ink, depicting the mind as a blazing, manic engine of thought and sensation. Captures a phase of heightened energy and creative combustion, balancing between brilliance and overload.

motifMap.meaning: layers of thought and sensory input

associatedMedia.description: Hand-drawn colored ink self-portrait of a manic, fiery mental state
